answers.answer: it's probably fluid retention. you are definitely not drinking enough (not even half of what you shoiuld be) and try avoid salty foods. people's weight fluctuates a lot during the day, so i wouldn't panic because of one or 2 day's measurement. i would think that kind of gain in one day is not gd but rather fluid retention. but overall, you really need to try to take better care of yourself or you will end up with gd or worse. i would just watch and make sure you don't continue to gain at that rate. if you gain more today, then call. don't expect to see those 2 lbs to go away by tomorrow.
Definitely fluid retention. Drink lots of water it will help flush it out of your system.
Don't weigh yourself every day! Its not accurate in the slightest.....You should only weigh yourself once a week due to how much your weight changes during the day!

i hear you i weigh myself at least twice a day (i was dieting earlier this year and became anal) and i have gained 2 pounds overnight.  im considering getting rid of my scale for the week lol.  it coud be water or did you eat too much ice cream like i have? lol.  be careful,  if your face is puffy and your eye sight changes call your dr.

Could be water retention, also your weight fluctuates, you could easily lose it the next day.  Sometimes you gain in spurts too.  I gained 6 lbs. one month with my first baby, before that I had gained 2 lbs. a month.  I wouldn't stress, some months you also may gain more and some less.  Call your Dr. if it will make you feel better, but sounds like a normal preganncy thing to me.

i have done that all through out my pregnancy.  If you drink some extra water over the next few days it will come right off.  i used to freak out because i would gain 6 lbs in a few days then id lose 5 in 2 or 3 days.  when i talked to the doctor she said to drink constant amounts of water.

question: HiI am 18w and I weigh myself every morning.  My usual pattern is two pounds a week. I don't know why, but I tend to gain two pounds at once at the end of every week.  Yesterday I had gained my two pounds and today I gained two more!!  I know this is a sign of gestational diabetes, but could it be just plain water retention?  Should I try drinking a lot of water today and call my dr in the morning if the two pounds don't go away?  My ankles are not swollen, but my hands seem to be.  I generally drink just water, but not a lot.  I probably drink about 3-4 9 oz bottles of water a day plus I have a glass of skim milk and I eat a lot of fruit, which have a lot of juice in them.  That's the extent of my fluid every day.  I know its probably not enough, but I just don't feel thirsty.  Yesterday I ate a small bag of chips that were very salty and we went out to dinner and I had beef tips that were soaked in a marinate and I am wondering if that marinate was salty as well I know a lot of them are.  I also drank lemonade with my dinner instead of water. My weight gain itself has been somewhat rapid in general.  I am 18w and if this extra two pounds this morning is just water I have gained 20 lbs, which worries me b/c three years ago I lost like 30 lbs.  My whole adult life I have been 156 and higher and I finally for the first time in my life was even smaller than I was in high school!! I managed to keep it off for 3 years and actually right now I am at what was a normal weight for me before the weight loss.  I am 36 yrs old and I know I am at higher risk for gestational diabetes and am worried about it. I have to admit I have not been eating very well.  Allowing myself to eat all those things I restricted myself from when I had lost the weight so I know my weight gain is my own fault, but these two pounds this morning worry me!!!  Has this ever happend to anyone and its just been water weight? I think I should drink lots of water today and see if that helps and if I don't lose the two pounds by tomorrow morning then call the dr and see what's going on.  What do you think? Thanks!
title: I have gained 4 lbs in 2 days!! Could I have gestational diabetes! Please help!!
